items.title: This investor imagined himself in 2035. He expects U.S. stocks to struggle.
items.description: It’s one thing to try to forecast a decade of returns, though many firms including JPMorgan and Vanguard regularly produce such forecasts.

items.title: My ex is sick but won’t retire to spite me out of benefits. He took our marriage and divorce papers, but can I get his Social Security benefits?
items.description: “I was married to my former husband for 11 years.”

items.title: Mortgage rates inch up to start the year at a near six-month high. Will the housing market become more affordable in 2025?
items.description: The 30-year mortgage rate averaged at 6.91%, Freddie Mac said in its latest weekly survey on Thursday.

items.title: Do stock holdings reflect individual risk preferences or the growing use of target-date funds?

items.title: These stock-trading moves can boost your portfolio if the ‘Santa Claus rally’ fails
items.description: Despite year-end selling, market conditions look promising for 2025.
